original_text: My sheep went over all the mountains and the high hills. They went to places everywhere on the earth. And nobody went to look for them and bring them back again.
korean_text: 내 양 떼가 모든 산과 높은 멧부리에마다 유리되었고 내 양 떼가 온 지면에 흩어졌으되 찾고 찾는 자가 없었도다

sentences.original_text: My sheep went over all the mountains
sentences.korean_translation: 나의 양들은 모든 산을 넘어 갔으며

sentences.original_text: They went to places everywhere on the earth
And nobody went to look for them
